readable.title: 2140182410_8e2a06fbda
readable.content: A boy in black winter clothes sits on an inflated sled by a mound of snow . A child rides down the snow in a tube . The kid is on a float in the snow . There is a person sitting on a plastic blow-up float in the high piled snow . This person , bundled up for the snow , slides down the hill on an intertube .
